description.english: Read and remembered the correct Voodoo sequence

description.french: Frotte les choses entre elles
description.italian: Strofinare cose insieme

description.italian: Ti sembro più pesante?

description.french: Lui a donné un coup de point. Il ne s’est rien passé.

description.japanese: パンチした。何も起こらなかった。

description.english: Harbors make me want to sing out loud

description.french: J’avais vraiment pas besoin de ça
description.italian: Non ho davvero bisogno di questi.

description.english: Can you tell me about the mural again?
description.french: Pouvez-vous encore me parler de la fresque ?
description.german: Kannst du mir noch einmal von dem Wandbild erzählen?
description.italian: Puoi parlarmi di nuovo del murale?
description.japanese: また壁画について語ってくれる？
description.koreana: 벽화에 대해서 다시 말해줄 수 있나요?
description.romanian: Îmi mai poți povesti o dată despre frescă?
description.russian: Не расскажете мне о фреске еще раз?
description.schinese: 你能再跟我说说那壁画吗？

description.english: I had to stick around and hear what happens!
description.french: Il fallait que je reste pour écouter la suite !
description.german: Ich musste hier bleiben und hören, was passiert!
description.hungarian: Itt kellett maradjak hogy halljam mi történik!
description.italian: Ho dovuto restare in giro e sentire cosa succede!
description.japanese: ここに残って、これから何が起きるか、聞く必要があると感じた
description.koreana: 저는 주변에 머무르며 무슨 일이 일어나는지 들어야 했어요!
description.romanian: A trebuit să stau s-aud cum se termină!
description.russian: Мне нужно было остаться и все разузнать!
description.schinese: 我得待在那里，听听发生了什么！
description.spanish: ¡Tuve que quedarme y escuchar lo que pasaba!

description.english: I can see my house from here!
description.french: Je peux voir ma maison d’ici !
description.german: Ich kann mein Haus von hier aus sehen!
description.italian: Posso vedere la mia casa da qui!
description.japanese: ここから実家が見える！
description.koreana: 이곳에서 제 집도 볼 수 있어요!
description.romanian: Îmi văd casa de-aici de sus!
description.schinese: 我可以从这里看到我的房子！

description.english: Why, yes, I do smell like dead fish!
description.french: Eh bien oui, je sens bien le poisson mort !
description.german: Ja, ja, ich rieche nach totem Fisch!
description.hungarian: Hát, ah, tényleg döglött halszagom van!

description.japanese: まあ、確かに私が腐った魚の匂いがする！
description.koreana: 왜, 그래요. 전 썩은 물고기 냄새가 난답니다!
description.romanian: Da' cum să nu miros a pești morți!
description.russian: Да, я пахну тухлой рыбой, и что!
description.schinese: 啊，没错，我确实闻着像死鱼！
